metadata.Title: CVE-2017-20148 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In the ebuild package through logcheck-1.3.23.ebuild for Logcheck on Gentoo, it is possible to achieve root privilege escalation from the logcheck user because of insecure recursive chown calls.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue in gentoo packaging, but the debian package postinst also does a recursive chown that bears investigation. mdeslaur> The scenario listed in the gentoo bug is mitigated by fs.protected_hardlinks = 1, downgrading severity to low

criterions.comment: logcheck: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
